name: css-isolation
description: Demonstration of CSS isolation between host and remote apps using Shadow DOM with Module Federation. Features 'app1' (host) loading 'app2' (remote) for CSS-isolated components.

scripts.e2e:ci: pnpm exec playwright install --with-deps && pnpm exec playwright test --reporter=list
scripts.legacy:e2e:ci: LEGACY_START=true pnpm exec playwright install --with-deps && LEGACY_START=true pnpm exec playwright test --reporter=list
